title: why cant oce have a pbe server
body: why cant oce have a pbe server, euw and na have pbe servers right? so why cant we is it because riot dont care about us or something?{{item:3070}} i hope some day we will get one {{item:3073}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: because we're a small surver. we only have like 200k players, do you really think they'd make a pbe for a server that small?

Also, if we were given a PBE server, no one would play on the normal server for anything other than ranked, because we are such a small region.

FinJaLaDa
If you want to play on PBE, make an EU or NA account and go play PBE. It doesn't really matter.
